forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain developing this afternoon. High 9C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain during the afternoon. High 49F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 6C. Winds ESE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 43F. Winds ESE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.
